channel.title: Zombie Minigame Weapons
channel.description:
Here are a few weapons i've made for the Zombie Minigame that is currently being developed by Tate and I.
If you're interested in helping me that'd be great i'm up to my knees in school work and have little time to create these models. No textures are included in these models as these are made for the server, I will add textured later but really I cbf atm as i'd rather be working on my Zombies and other weapons...
[u][size=12pt]Weapons:[/size][/u] (btw this is not all the weapons i've created but only the ones i've taken screenshots of)
[size=14pt][b]Dragunov[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Dragunov-1.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Uzi No Addons[/b][/size] (I will be adding a silencer and recoil control stick to the Uzi soon, here's semi-final result, I still have to recolour and change a little but yer...) [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Uzi.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]AK47 w/Launcher[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/AK47.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Colt 45[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Colt45-1.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Desert Eagle[/b][/size] (I know this one isn't as good as the others but that's cause this pic was taken before I had recoloured it, that's why it looks a lil odd) [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/DesertEagle.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt][u]Working On:[/u][/size]
I'm taking a break for today, making some requested models for ppls atm.
[size=15pt][b]Advice is welcome![/b][/size] If you want to know more about this minigame it will be out in about 2 weeks on the server Noobscape. yer...

item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

ya im not trying to be mean or anything it just does look scepticle i hope u underdstand that… uh… i kinda belive u ill take your word for now… but im still keeping an eye out…

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Minigame Weapons
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“Buddy_budster, post:22, topic:279199”]im sorry but this looks to vaguliy familiar… hmmm

Look at the barel has exact same notches… same scope… same stain on the wood at the butt of the gun… even the same ammo cartridge…

http://artist-3d.com/free_3d_models/uploads/screen%20dragunov%202.png

http://artist-3d.com/free_3d_models/dnm/model_disp.php?uid=1854&ad=08military_weapons.php&count=count

All he did was download it and put it into meta… The disasemble the scope and other and put it back on later…

Frell please lock or delete this…[/quote]

Firstly I don’t even know how to put other models into meta, I don’t even think it’s possible. I know Butterscaperules got wow models but they were meta files to begin with.

Secondly, I didn’t just change the scope and do what you said, I actually have one of the earlier models of it when I had only made about half of it 3D, it’d on my other PC so i’ll upload tomorrow.

Thirdly, the gun that person modeled is the Dragunov, the gun I modeled is the dragunov, they’re the same gun so of course they’re going to look quite similar.

Last but not least, I just checked and you can’t even download that model off the link you provided so your claim has absolutely no evidence and is based on “Well they look the same”, the thing is though the gun I modeled IS THE SAME.

I just found out how to download, now I look ike an idiot

I just downloaded and in the download theres a pic of his gun, I just realise that I used that pic to trace the stock and I actually based my weapon on that picture since I know practically nothing about the Dragunov.

I got pic from google: http://images.google.com.au/images?hl=en&q=dragunov&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=N&tab=wi
It’s second picture xD

Look if you don’t believe me then I can let u teamview next time I model, if you accept you will be able to view only and yer.
Btw my model took about 3 to 3 half hours all up in case you were wondering.

Oh and btw this is not in anger or anything, I understand that you have to be skeptical about this, i’ve spent a few days on this forum, i’ve seen how horrible half the people are at modeling(no offense to anyone).

Read full topic

Frell please lock or delete this…

item.title: Zombie Minigame Weapons
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:19, topic:279199”][quote author=wayzey link=topic=368505.msg2792450#msg2792450 date=1242862595]

I’m impressed, very good job.

Thanks, I don’t really see why people on here act(as in this forum) as if it’s really hard though, it’s pretty easy to pick up, the only real hard thing is just making a good outline of the object and the rest just takes time.
[/quote]
You don’t understand because you trace images. It’s a whole different story when you freehand from a cube.

On topic: there good as far as traced image models go.[/quote]

I only trace if it’s something like guns which I know very little about the shape of them.
And these are for my mates Server so I can’t do too much detail.

After i’m done with this set of models i’m going to go learn how to use blender and yer.
Oh and I do understand, my post was retorical, what I was saying was that people on this forum overexagurate how hard it is to make models like those above, I understand the difficulty in making models that you make, they’re incredibly good. People though just recolour and make models out of crappy primitives, my post was directed at them.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Minigame Weapons
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:13, topic:279199”][quote author=wayzey link=topic=368505.msg2792318#msg2792318 date=1242856358]

Hm, did you actually make these in metasequoia, or import them from somewhere else?

I made entirely in Metaseq. Tate, my mate teamviewed my making half of one of them and yer. I’m currently in process of making Dragunov, Uzi and a Futuristic Flamethrower if you want I can upload pics of what i’ve got so far if you doubt me.

flamethrower would be cool, you could use the dragon breath gfx as the flame possibly XD

Actually that was what I was probably going to do xD
Either that or make the ammunition the flame in Metaseq and just fiddle with the options to get the flame going right.
[/quote]

If you really did, you are amazing. (:
I like to have my doubts about people, i always track down leechers.
Not saying you are but yeah.

Yeah, if possible, could you upload a progress picture?[/quote]

I’m currently just making the base for my Uzi and my Dragunov is on my good PC (which is another room)

Here’s pic of what i’ve done so far, i’ve spend about 20-30 minutes on it and i’ll get another screenshot when it’s about halfway done cause this pic is just flat atm xD

Oh and I found a screeny of when I was making my DE though like this one I was still finishing the base:

Read full topic
